tool_description: IMG4Me is a free service to convert your text into image. You can use this service to prevent crawlers and robots from copying your email address, articles, or website contents. Meanwhile, you can handle encoding errors as well if your text is in non-English characters.
name: IMG4Me - Text to Image Service
title: IMG4Me - Text to Image Service

api_list.name: Main
api_list.description: The API will return the URL of the image generated.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Text to be converted into image.

optional_parameters.name: font
optional_parameters.description: Font for the image generated. Supported word: arial, comic, dyslexic, georgia, impact, lucida, simsun, tahoma, times, trebuchet, verdana

optional_parameters.name: bcolor
optional_parameters.description: Background color in HEX. Leave empty for transparent background.
